searchengine

Interface Index

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InvertedIndex, InvertedIndexHashMap, InvertedIndexTreeMap, SimpleIndex

    public interface Index
    The index data structure provides a way to build an index from a list of websites. It allows to lookup the websites that contain a query word.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int size 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void build(java.util.List<Website> sites)
      The build method processes a list of websites into the index data structure.
      java.util.List<Website> lookup(java.lang.String query)
      Given a query string, returns a list of all websites that contain the query.
      int size() 

    • Field Detail

      • size

        static final int size
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • build

        void build(java.util.List<Website> sites)
        The build method processes a list of websites into the index data structure.
        Parameters:
        sites - The list of websites that should be indexed

      • lookup

        java.util.List<Website> lookup(java.lang.String query)
        Given a query string, returns a list of all websites that contain the query.
        Parameters:
        query - The query
        Returns:
        the list of websites that contains the query word.

      • size

        int size()
        Returns:
        the size the index used.
